revision.title: third revision
revision.text:
* Validate Parameters skip if is datatype[$xArgument1] == [DATATYPE_SHIP] return null
* FIND ALL SHIPS IN THE SECTOR $iCurrentTime = playing time $oSector = $xArgument1 -> get sector $aShips = find ship: sector=$oSector class or type=[Moveable Ship] race=null flags=[Find.Multiple] refobj=null maxdist=null maxnum=100 refpos=null
$iCount = size of array $aShips $aTemp = array alloc: size=$iCount while $iCount > 0 dec $iCount $oShip = $aShips[$iCount] skip if $oShip -> exists goto removeShipFromSearch:
* Remove if not police $xSubResult = [THIS] -> call named script 'plugin.piracy.lib.logic' : szFunction='ClassifyVessel' xArgument1=$oShip xArgument2=[TRUE] skip if $xSubResult == 3 goto removeShipFromSearch:
* Remove if already alert gosub isShipAlerted: skip if $xSubResult == [TRUE] goto removeShipFromSearch:
* Save distance to vessel $i = get distance between $oShip and $xArgument1 $aTemp[$iCount] = $i continue
removeShipFromSearch: remove element from array $aShips at index $iCount remove element from array $aTemp at index $iCount end
